meanings.sent1: The misbuilt house had crooked walls and uneven floors.
meanings.sent2: The misbuilt bridge collapsed under the weight of the cars.
meanings.sent3: The misbuilt chair wobbled and creaked with every movement.
meanings.sent4: Her misbuilt confidence crumbled at the first sign of criticism.
meanings.sent5: The misbuilt puzzle pieces didn't fit together properly.

meanings.definition: Built in a faulty or unsatisfactory manner.
meanings.sent1: The misbuilt machine kept breaking down due to design flaws.
meanings.sent2: The misbuilt clock always ran too fast or too slow.
meanings.sent3: The misbuilt toy car fell apart as soon as it hit the ground.
meanings.sent4: His misbuilt plan unraveled when key details were overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The misbuilt boat leaked water from multiple cracks.
